mapper.select: SELECT b.board_seq AS boardSeq ,b.user_seq AS userSeq ,wu.user_id AS userId ,b.title ,b.content ,DATE_FORMAT(b.edit_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS editDate ,DATE_FORMAT(b.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDate FROM ${board}_board b LEFT OUTER JOIN white_user wu ON wu.user_seq = b.user_seq WHERE b.board_seq = #{boardSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${board}_board(user_seq, title, content, edit_date, reg_date) VALUES( #{userSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW() )
